page.syntax: as P = Form.Create(C table_or_set,C format[,P style])

argument.name: P
argument.description: A pointer to the form that you have created.

argument.name: table_or_set
argument.description: The name of a table or set.

argument.name: format
argument.description: Default text that appears on the form.

argument.name: style
argument.description: Optional. Default = "Alpha Anywhere Default". A pointer to a stylesheet. Use A5_STYLESHEET_ENUM()to get a list of styles.

page.description: Creates on-the-fly layout from a definition for the table/set named.
page.discussion: The FORM.CREATE() method creates a form layout for the selected table or set and then displays the form in View mode.
page.example: dim ptr as P dim ssh as P dim ssl as C ssl = a5_stylesheet_enum() ? ssl = Alpha Anywhere Default Alpha Anywhere Drop Shadows Alpha Anywhere Stamped Metal Alphasports Avant Garden Blue Concrete Blue Contrast ... ? a5_ss_get(ssh, "Avant Garden") = .T. ptr = form.create("customer", "dialog", ssh)
